mapper.select: SELECT sender, reciever, content, message.datetime, send.nickname as senderNickname, send.name as senderName, recieve.nickname as recieverNickname, recieve.name as recieverName FROM message, member send, member recieve WHERE (sender = #{id} OR reciever = #{id}) AND send.id=sender AND recieve.id=reciever ORDER BY datetime desc
